Use-cases

Check out all the text-to-video and text-to-speech use-cases offered by Fliki.

Content Creation

Create Stunning Content with AI

Step into the future of content creation with Fliki. From producing engaging YouTube videos to catchy Insta Reels, creating viral TikTok content, and creating compelling podcasts and audiobooks, we have got you covered.

Youtube Videos · Instagram Reels · TikTok · Facebook · LinkedIn · Twitter · Podcasts · Audiobooks

View use-case →

Business and Corporate

Revolutionize Your Business Communication with Engaging Video Content

Transform your business narratives into compelling and professional videos with our innovative text to video tool. Elevate engagement, boost brand visibility, and drive growth by creating high-quality corporate videos, product demos, pitches, and slideshows effortlessly.

Corporate Videos · Pitch Videos · Product Demo Videos · Slideshow Videos · Sales Videos

View use-case →

Training Videos

Create training videos with AI in just minutes

Turn your PPTs or scripts into professional training videos using templates, and seamlessly translate them into 80+ languages with just one click.

Employee Onboarding · Product Training · Leadership Development

View use-case →

Internal Communication

Create videos for internal communications in minutes

Transform your PPTs or scripts into impactful internal communication videos—like townhalls, performance updates, or announcements—using templates, and seamlessly translate them into 80+ languages with just one click..

Team Announcements · Company Updates · Employee Engagement

View use-case →

Marketing and Social Media

Amplify Your Marketing and Social Media Impact with Dynamic Video Content Creation

Transform your marketing and social media strategies with our innovative text to video tool. Elevate your brand's presence, engage your audience, and boost conversions with high-quality, dynamic video content created faster and easier.

Promo Videos · Video Ads · Social Media Content · Meme Maker

View use-case →

Education and E-Learning

Transform Educational Videos With Fliki's AI-driven Tools

Explore advanced AI tools that are reshaping education and making learning interactive once again. Change the way we learn and engage with educational content, and revolutionize education one video at a time.

Educational Videos · Training Videos · Explainer Videos

View use-case →

eCommerce

Create Videos to improve Product Marketing and Understanding

Elevate your eCommerce with Fliki, the cutting-edge text-to-video tool. Harness the power of engaging content to enhance product understanding and boost sales.

Product explainer · Product marketing

View use-case →

Localization and Translation

Master Localization and Translation for Impactful Global Reach

Unlock the power of global communication with our Translation feature. Seamlessly transform your script into over 80 languages and create high-quality videos that resonate with audiences worldwide.

Localization · Translation

View use-case →
